"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fbda036368722e21cd0100#post_53fbda036368722e21cd0100
Not actually as bad as soldiers would lead you to believe. Biggest one I've ever seen was about palm sized, they aren't venomous and while they will chase people its only because they want to be in your shade.

They will however chew chunks out of your hair while you sleep to build their nests.
